00019 #ifndef _SHARED_MEMORY_LOCK_HPP_cm140322_
00020 #define _SHARED_MEMORY_LOCK_HPP_cm140322_
00021 
00022 #include <stdexcept>
00023 #include <string>
00024 
00025 #include <boost/format.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/interprocess/mapped_region.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/interprocess/shared_memory_object.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/interprocess/sync/interprocess_upgradable_mutex.hpp>
00029 
00030 class shared_data {
00031 public:
00032   typedef boost::interprocess::interprocess_upgradable_mutex mutex_type;
00033 
00034   const mutex_type& get_mutex() const { return mutex_; }
00035   mutex_type& get_mutex() { return mutex_; }
00036 
00037 protected:
00038 private:
00039   mutable mutex_type mutex_;
00040 } ;
00041 
00042 class shm_manager_parent {
00043 public:
00044   shm_manager_parent(std::string name="SO12439099-MySharedMemory")
00045     : name_(remove_shm(name))
00046     , shm_(boost::interprocess::create_only, name.c_str(), boost::interprocess::read_write)
00047     , dummy_(truncate(shm_))
00048     , region_(shm_, boost::interprocess::read_write) {    
00049     // Construct the shared_data.
00050     new (region_.get_address()) shared_data;
00051   }
00052   ~shm_manager_parent() {
00053     std::cout << "~shm_manager_parent" << std::endl;
00054     boost::interprocess::shared_memory_object::remove(name_.c_str());
00055   }
00056 
00057   shared_data& get_shared_data() {
00058     return *static_cast<shared_data *>(region_.get_address());
00059   }
00060 protected:
00061   static std::string remove_shm(std::string name) {
00062     boost::interprocess::shared_memory_object::remove(name.c_str());
00063     return name;
00064   }
00065   static int truncate(boost::interprocess::shared_memory_object& shm) {
00066      shm.truncate(sizeof(shared_data));
00067     return 0;
00068   }
00069 private:
00070   const std::string name_;
00071   boost::interprocess::shared_memory_object shm_;
00072   const int dummy_;
00073   boost::interprocess::mapped_region region_;
00074 } ;
00075 
00076 class shm_manager_child {
00077 public:
00078   shm_manager_child(const char* name="SO12439099-MySharedMemory")
00079     : name_(name)
00080     , shm_(boost::interprocess::open_only, name, boost::interprocess::read_write)
00081     , region_(shm_, boost::interprocess::read_write)
00082   {}
00083 
00084   ~shm_manager_child() {}
00085 
00086   shared_data& get_shared_data() {
00087     return *static_cast<shared_data *>(region_.get_address());
00088   }
00089 protected:
00090 private:
00091   std::string name_;
00092   boost::interprocess::shared_memory_object shm_;
00093   boost::interprocess::mapped_region        region_;
00094 } ;
00095 
00096 class cuda_mutex {
00097 public:
00098   typedef shared_data::mutex_type mutex_type;
00099 
00100   static const char* name() { return "CUDA_mutex"; }
00101 
00102   static mutex_type& get() {
00103     static shm_manager_child s(cuda_mutex::name());
00104     return s.get_shared_data().get_mutex();
00105   }
00106 } ;
